column4: Hey guys. I just installed the Lexmark Z600 printer, but when I use localhost:631 and the PPD I extracted, I am asked for a password. I own both computers that I network (the other one was a Windows) and I don't remember setting a password. In fact, I can access the Windows printer from here when this one is on Windows.
You mean the Windows one... the one that is connected to the printer?
you must give admin username& password
